name: Unguaranteed _ABS Class - Junior_Secured
description: In case of unguaranteed securities, there are no obligations to guarantors to make payments to the holder of the security if the issuer fails to meet the obligation to make repayments arising under the instrument secured by the guarantor.In case of Asset-backed securities, a breakdown of the tranch level is to be provided. Securities are backed by assets, future income streams or similar.
